title: New Castelli Premio Black bibshorts aim for ultimate (minimalist) comfort on long rides
content:
By paring down the bibshort to just a few pieces of fabric, the new Castelli Premio Black bike shorts provide maximum comfort with minimal material. The main body of the shorts is just three pieces of fabric…one for each leg, plus a front panel. And the fabric itself is lighter and thinner thanks to an […]

The post New Castelli Premio Black bibshorts aim for ultimate (minimalist) comfort on long rides appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
